main event: On February 23, 1967, a civilian observed a strange object in a field and took four rolls of film capturing 32 pictures, including one of it taking off.
interesting points: The sighting occurred near Escanaba, Michigan., The exact length of observation was not reported., The report was forwarded to the Central Intelligence Agency from the Department of Defense., The Air Force expressed interest in evaluating the film taken by the witness., The witness threatened to publish the photos if no explanation was provided.
witness description: a civilian who reported the sighting
